text: The 2016–17 Armenian Premier League season was the 25th since its establishment. The season began on 6 August 2016 and ended on 31 May 2017. Alashkert are the defending champions. ==Teams== Six teams competed in this year's competition. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Club !Location !Stadium !Capacity |- |||Yerevan (Shengavit)||Alashkert Stadium|| style="text- align:center;"|6,850 |- |||Yerevan (Kentron) Yerevan (Shengavit)||Vazgen Sargsyan Stadium Mika Stadium1|| style="text-align:center;"|14,403 7,250 |- |||Yerevan (Malatia-Sebastia)||Banants Stadium|| style="text- align:center;"|4,860 |- |||Kapan Yerevan (Kentron)||Gandzasar Stadium Vazgen Sargsyan Stadium2|| style="text-align:center;"|3,500 14,403 |- |||Yerevan (Avan)||Football Academy Stadium|| style="text- align:center;"| 1,428 |- |||Gyumri||Gyumri City Stadium|| style="text- align:center;"|2,844 |} * 1Ararat Yerevan moved to the Mika Stadium during the second half of the season. * 2Gandzasar Kapan moved to the Vazgen Sargsyan Stadium in Yerevan during the second half of the season. ===Personnel and sponsorship=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: left;" ! Team ! Chairman ! Head Coach ! Captain ! Kit manufacturer ! Shirt sponsor |- |Alashkert | Bagrat Navoyan | Abraham Khashmanyan | Vahagn Minasyan | Joma | Bagratour Huawei |- |Ararat Yerevan | Hrach Kaprielyan | Arkady Andreasyan | Rafayel Safaryan | Adidas | |- |Banants | Hrach Aghabekian | Artur Voskanyan | Stepan Ghazaryan | Adidas | |- |Gandzasar Kapan | Vahe Hakobyan | Ashot Barseghyan | Aleksandr Petrosyan | Adidas | ZCMC |- |Pyunik | Rafik Hayrapetyan | Artak Oseyan | Vardan Pogosyan | Nike | Armenian Development Bank |- |Shirak | Arman Sahakyan | Vardan Bichakhchyan | Gevorg Hovhannisyan | Adidas | menu.am |- |} ==League table== ==Results== The league was played in three stages. The six teams played each other six times, three times at home and three times away, for a total of 30 matches per team. ==Season statistics== ===Top scorers=== As of 31 May 2017 {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !Player !Club !Goals |- |rowspan=2|1 |align="left"| Artak Yedigaryan |align="left"|Alashkert |rowspan=2|13 |- |align="left"| Mihran Manasyan |align="left"|Alashkert |- |rowspan=1|3 |align="left"| Gegham Harutyunyan |align="left"|Gandzasar Kapan |12 |- |rowspan=2|4 |align="left"| Claudir |align="left"|Gandzasar Kapan |rowspan=2|8 |- |align="left"| Viulen Ayvazyan |align="left"|Shirak Gyumri |- |rowspan=2|6 |align="left"| Zaven Badoyan |align="left"|Alashkert |rowspan=2|6 |- |align="left"| Artak Dashyan |align="left"|Alashkert |- |rowspan=3|6 |align="left"| Lubambo Musonda |align="left"|Gandzasar Kapan |rowspan=3|5 |- |align="left"| Walmerson Garcia Praia |align="left"|Gandzasar Kapan |- |align="left"| Alik Arakelyan |align="left"|Pyunik |} ==References== ==External links== * ffa.am * soccerway.com * uefa.com * rsssf.com Category:Armenian Premier League seasons Arm 1
